articles.title: Monkeypox scare: WHO says vaccines not 100 per cent effective - DNA India
articles.description: Monkeypox virus is not easily transmitted and usually spreads through close physical contact, including sexual contact, with an infected individual.
articles.content:
According to WHO technical lead Rosamund Lewis, vaccines against monkeypox are not 100 per cent effective. Hence, people must reduce their own risks of infection.
